io.netty.channel.epoll

Class AbstractEpollServerChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.util.DefaultAttributeMap
      • io.netty.channel.AbstractChannel
        • io.netty.channel.epoll.AbstractEpollServerChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, ServerChannel, UnixChannel, AttributeMap, Comparable<Channel>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EpollServerDomainSocketChannel, EpollServerSocketChannel

    public abstract class AbstractEpollServerChannel
extends AbstractChannel
implements ServerChannel

      • newDirectBuffer

        protected final ByteBuf newDirectBuffer(Object holder,
                      ByteBuf buf)
        Returns an off-heap copy of the specified ByteBuf, and releases the specified holder. The caller must ensure that the holder releases the original ByteBuf when the holder is released by this method.
